vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.12;
son of: Perez (H6557);
brother of: Hezron (H2696H)
Also named: cha.mu.li (חָמוּלִי "Hamulite" H2539)
§ Hamul = "spared"
the younger son of Pharez, Judah's son by Tamar
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Fares; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈母勒 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "留下"
猶大與他瑪所生的兒子法勒斯的小兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈母勒 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "留下"
犹大与他玛所生的儿子法勒斯的小儿子
